verbs.description: [ARG1: skyway system] [V: proposed] [ARGM-ADV: again] [ARGM-TMP: this time] [ARGM-PRP: for airport to downtown route] a proposed tram linking the san diego international airport to downtown may appear like an amusement park ride but one local official said the idea is n’t so farfetched ron roberts san diego zoo san diego halifax international airport authority san diego convention center balboa park airport authority san diego international airport
